```{r}
# EJECICIO DE PRUEBA

# numero de ITERACIONES
n<-100

# punto de arranco
x0<- 1/3
y0<- 1/3

# tiempo de espera
s <- 0.1

m<-matrix(0,ncol=2,nrow=n+1)
m[1,] <- c(x0,y0)
par(las=1)
plot(0,0, xlim = c(0,1), ylim = c(0,1), axes=FALSE, xlab=expression(x[n]), ylab=expression(y[n]), type='n')
box()
axis(1,seq(0,1,0.2))
axis(2,seq(0,1,0.2))
abline(h = 0, v = 0)


for (i in 1:n){
	xi <- m[i,1] + m[i,2]
	xi <- xi - floor(xi)

	yi <- 2*m[i,1] + m[i,2]
	yi <- yi - floor(yi)
	
	m[i+1,]<-c(xi,yi)
	print(m[i+1])
	points(m[1:i,1],m[1:i,2], pch=16, col=gray(0.8))
	points(m[i,1],m[i,2], pch=16, col='red')
	Sys.sleep(s)
}

```
